inclusion.criterion: Infants aged ≤ 18 months presenting to the unit for the treatment of moderate-severe
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Moderate-severe bronchiolitis required having a prodromal history consistent with viral upper respiratory tract infection followed by wheezing and/or crackles on auscultation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Wang bronchiolitis severity score of ≥ 4 on presentation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Steroid use within 48 hours of presentation
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Obtundation and progressive respiratory failure requiring ICU admission
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of apnea with in 24 hours before presentation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Oxygen saturation ≤ 85% on room air at the time of recruitment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of a diagnosis of chronic lung disease
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has history of recurrent C diff infections and recent antibx use, which may trigger exclusion criteria.
